entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending overnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 10:40 PM AST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing near noon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 19. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:40 PM AST Thursday 19 January 2023
